Author: cryptodalailama
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: InsurePal Presale Sold-Out. Crowdsale Starts on 16 January 2018.  We are happy to announce that we have reached our funding goal and sold out 70% (140,700,000) of IPL tokens during the whitelisting presale at 15:00 UTC. From this moment, the presale is officially closed and transactions are no longer accepted. Keep in mind, in order to participate in the token crowdsale, whitelisting and KYC will be obligatory.  InsurePal Presale Hard Cap Sold Out InsurePal has reached presale hard cap of $12 million in just a few days since it opened. We have paused accepting new contributions and will reopen for our regular InsurePal token sale, starting on January 16.  Whitelisting presale is therefore officially closed. The funds raised will be used for the development of InsurePal platform, enhancing user experience and making vital strategic partnership to become number 1 social-proof insurance on blockchain in the world.  For IPL Crowdsale Whitelisting&KYC Are Obligatory Please, keep in mind some important notifications:  1) The presale is now officially closed. We no longer accept any transactions. If you have sent us funds after reaching the presale hard cap, we will transfer them back to your wallet address.  2) InsurePal public token crowdsale will begin on 16 January 2018. Only those who will whitelist their wallet addresses and successfully complete the KYC process prior to the date will be able to participate.  3) If you didn`t make it on time, don`t worry. Your turn will come during the upcoming ICO on January 16. However, we advise you to act quickly: whitelist your address and complete the KYC process by following this link: https://insurepal.io/whitelist.  On this occasion, we sincerely thank each and every one of the early contributors who supported us in such a large number and confirmed we are on the right track. There are a lot of goals and challenges ahead of us. We commit ourselves to follow the roadmap plans, taking into account all the principles of transparency, and of course: your advice.  We kindly invite you to actively co-create the future of insurance, which is ultimately intended to serve you best!  For more information about InsurePal crowdsale, visit our website www.insurepal.io and join us in conversation!  For all lazybones =)

Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: InsurePal Welcomes Bitcoin Pioneer Charlie Shrem and the Crypto IQ As Advisors Charlie Shrem joined InsurePal as business development advisor right before the end of 2017. His rich entrepreneur experience in managing crypto and non-crypto companies will serve as an important guidance to developing InsurePal social proof platform for mass adoption.  InsurePal is set to revolutionize the insurance industry by harnessing blockchain technology and merging it with social proofing, bringing cost reduction and a positive societal impact. The startup company is the voice of change that promises to bring disruption to the old insurance paradigm by challenging its sole core. To help us in navigating the challenges and direct the platform development in the direction envisioned, it is crucial to work with individuals and visionaries who possess a unique knowledge and insights from comprehensive areas.  Blockchain advancement, Adoption and User-Centricity as Key Strategic Points As a Bitcoin pioneer, a social economist, digital currency trader, and ultimate crypto insider, Charlie Shrem is at the epicenter of the crypto universe. He has advised more than a dozen digital currency companies and launched and managed numerous partnerships between crypto and non-crypto enterprises.  He recently founded Crypto IQ, a media and advisory business with a team of seasoned Wall Street veterans that aims to simplify the crypto world and bring virtual currencies mainstream. InsurePal works on a similar premise and aims at wider acceptance of the crypto economy by fortifying new insurance services on the blockchain.  “I’m excited to join the advisory team on this project, and our company, Crypto IQ, is getting involved as well,” Shrem said. “InsurePal is a very interesting concept, and I like to get involved in blockchain projects that are not finance-related. This team has its past success. It has been involved with other companies and has performed well. I believe we can be the bridge between crypto and non-crypto insurance, which will be a very interesting thing.” In taking an advisory role, Charlie Shrem will help InsurePal become a bridge between tradition and innovation that will shape the insurance industry moving forward. With his connections, business insights and interdisciplinary experience, he is one of the most well-known names in the cryptocurrency community and will help InsurePal achieve and exceed its goal of developing a technologically advanced blockchain platform that is easy-to-use for the widest audience.  “InsurePal will bring this innovative concept of social proof and blockchain insurance to the people who have yet to be involved in crypto and provide an insurance solution for them,” Shrem said. “That is the most interesting part of it.” Vision, Experience and Industry Know-How Crucial For InsurePal’s Long-Term Success The dedicated experts at InsurePal have lived for the project since day one. Our efforts have been recognized by many individuals, who are respected in the industry as well as principals at established blockchain startups, among them Mattereum and Hive. The team also recently welcomed Peter M. Moricz, founder and CEO at Moricz.io, in an effort to build strategic partnerships and give its endeavors credibility. This will ensure the long-term success of the InsurePal platform.  “I think we all have to understand this is the beginning of the long process,” Moricz said. “InsurepPal is building something from the “get go” to make sure that people can see what opportunities are out there. And I think that people should come along, join their team and ICO to make sure it works out in the long run, as it is a great ride to be on.” Charlie Shrem and Crypto.IQ join a well-rounded team of experts, partnering on projects that will harness the power of social proofing on the blockchain and help InsurePal lead the way to a different future for the insurance industry. The public is invited to help make this vision reality by participating in a public token crowd sale, beginning Jan. 16.  For more information about InsurePal crowdsale, visit our website www.insurepal.io and join us in conversation!

Author: xiao2017
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: This video is just awesome!   When I was in Slovenia this month I met a company called InsurePal that is decentralizing the insurance industry using blockchain technology.  Their research shows that this will reduce fraud, bring costs down, and make insurance more efficient. I thought it was a super interesting idea, so we shot a quick interview at the hotel to explain the concept.  The next day, InsurePal actually won the d10e ICO pitch contest, and 4 days later they won the next contest in Bucharest, so I'm glad I wasn't the only one who thought this idea was really cool!  Let me know what you think in the comments! You can find out more about their January 18 ICO at Insurepal.io  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CQSn5GVyI_w

Author: geoneojapan
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Insurance startup InsurePal to launch £15m initial coin offering  Millennial-focused insurance startup InsurePal has announced it is raising £15m in an initial coin offering (ICO) to fund its UK motor launch in the first half of 2018.  ICOs are a type of crowdfunding using cryptocurrencies, but they have been criticised by the Financial Conduct Authority as “very high-risk, speculative investments”.  InsurePal uses the ethereum blockchain as a platform for transactions. It claims to offer lower premiums for customers that are able to gain “social proof” endorsements, a system where friends can vouch for each other’s driving with a financial commitment, such as credit card details, as a guarantee.  Guarantors are then rewarded with tokens that can be used for their own discounts, sold or kept as an investment.  The ICO will close on 16 January, and InsurePal said its motor pilot is set to be followed by schemes for property, casualty, life and health.   Interesting!

Author: Crypto_maniac7
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: What happens in this case.. This year I had two accidents where I needed to report the damage and use the casco insurance (full protection from damages). In any of this accident it wasn't my fault, my car got scratched in the parking lot. What happens and where do I report such accidents in InsurePal?

Author: matjazsircelj
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: My colleague Max (UK finance) wrote about claims in Telegram group and it's best if I just post his answer here: "It depends: for UK car pilot - it’s still insurance model just with better fit for risk and ownership of data linked to participants - but claims are managed in the same way. If insurepal social proof is licensed out then it’s up to the licensor (well established insurance business) to follow the protocol. If blockchain business transactions are considered there it’s a smart contract basis - it’s very binary in most cases and when it becomes vague or obscure then that’s why we are so proud of our cooperation with Mattereum (an internet of agreements company)."

Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Thank you guys for such a wonderfull new year eve's gift   Dear members of InsurePal community,  It`s all about simplicity. It`s about social proof insurance returning power from insurance institutions back to an individual user. It is also about insuring assets and arrangements that have so far not yet been covered. It`s about making insurance work for you!   That is why we are counting: the moments until the New Year and those that separate us to reach our ultimate goal. January 16, the date of InsurePal token crowdsale, is approaching fast and our team can hardly wait to put things in motion.   We are incredibly proud of the growing number of supporters; positive media mentions and respected industry experts who decided to publicly support InsurePal. All of you have made it possible for us to achieve an exceptional milestone already now: we reached Soft Cap of $5 million right before New Year`s. This incredible achievement confirms strong interest from all over the world and serves as even greater motivation.   Our ambition is high and we believe the 70% of IPL tokens will be sold before the public token crowdsale. That is why we invite you to claim your share and receive 10% bonus by contributing in the pre-sale whitelist which is open only by 8 January.   InsurePal surely enters the 2018 year full of optimism and dedication to make social proof insurance on blockchain a reality. We sincerely thank you for all the support and wish you all the best. Or, better say: to the moon! 😉   InsurePal team

Author: Carolus_Rex
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: First, I congratulate you on a great vision, great project and hopefully great ICO!  Like everybody else, I also wanted to ask about exchanges in Q1, but I understand your position and I'll just skip that.  In your roadmap, you said 2018: pilot project and platform launch? Can you be more specific? It is a pretty big difference to me as an investor if your platform is ready in April or if it is ready in October. I am not asking a firm commitment here, but just a more precise timeline for these two important events: platform and project start (at least expected quarter...). Also, hope the development of the platform is going as planned, everything good?  Your pilot program in the UK, can you tell something more about its size? Some numbers, volume, expected customers, anything? Just so I can judge the scale and scope of the project.  Best of luck and hopefully you will be notifying us that the project has broken softcap!

Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Hi, thanks for asking. Here are few things to consider InsurePal as a valuable investment.  The founders are in insurance business with proven track record for over 15 years.  The team is assembled from excellent blochchain experts and advisors. https://insurepal.io/team  This is the first time we have successfully reinvented the social proof for insurance industry. Social proof is an innovation in insurance for which we filed a patent protection in US and worldwide. http://www.freepatentsonline.com/y2017/0243298.html  Proof of concept on GitHub. https://github.com/InsurePal  Partnership and support from Mattereum and Vinay Gupta https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/mattereum-and-insurepal-sign-letter-of-intent-to-collaborate-on-effective-mass-use-of-blockchain-1eda70b2fd97  Partnership with Hive Project just announced https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/partnerships-hive-project-to-use-insurepal-s-social-proof-methodology-9625ff595021   And we have an amazing support from the community, on our social channels, Telegram... https://t.me/InsurePal

Author: xiao2017
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Yaaaay i just invest    For those of you who believe in our vision the most, we have decided to open a presale whitelist for which you can apply until 8 January 2018. A successful acceptance to the whitelist will guarantee you the ability to contribute a specific amount of ETH prior to the official IPL crowdsale start. Please, note that whitelisted contributors will need to fill out KYC (“Know Your Customer”) information. Otherwise, we will not be able to issue you the IPL tokens and the funds will be returned back to your wallet.  Citizens or individuals with lawful permanent resident or domicile in the USA, Canada, South Korea, Singapore, China are not allowed to contribute in the InsurePal whitelist presale. If during the KYC proces the contributor is identified to come from the mentioned countries, its participation will be canceled and the tokens will be refunded.  Thank you for your registration. We will send further instructions to your e-mail.

Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance

Author: semsyor
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: [Partnerships] Hive Project to Use InsurePal`s Social-Proof Methodology  InsurePal shares a vision in which blockchain soon becomes the first choice of masses, recognizing all the more useful solutions that give added value to users and don`t feed hungry corporations. Therefore, already at the present stage we are doing what we believe is a necessity fort the bloom of crypto economy.  We are always looking for like-minded supporters, partners, visionaries, advisors, experts and good projects with solid foundation to connect. Conversations and constructive proposals are all essential ingredients of the new alternative ecosystem that is already laying the foundation for the current economy which no longer serves the need of the users, but only feeds itself.  One such project is the Hive Project (HVN), the first blockchain based platform providing ŞMEs worldwide fast and lowcost liquidity — and winner of “Best ICO 2017” at CoinAgenda Global in Barcelona — which we met in San Francisco, exchanged ideas and found that there are a lot of shared points between us. We will cooperate with them in order to run InsurePal patent-pending social proof methodology on their platform in the very near future.  https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/partnerships-hive-project-to-use-insurepal-s-social-proof-methodology-9625ff595021

Author: matjazsircelj
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: In the presale whitelist, you get 10% (min is 1 ETH) and you'll get your seat for sure, you won't miss the opportinity to invest. Presale is till 8 January.  Crowdsale starts on 16 January, the bonus 10% is for those who contribute in the first 96 hours or those who contribute over 50 ETH.  In your case there is no 10% bonus. You probably filled out the KYC form which takes 24 hours or more to be checked by the backoffice and send you back an email with confirmation (or rejection). You're also welcome to join the Telegram group https://t.me/InsurePal to chat with the community.

Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance

Author: cryptoworld2017
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: The crypto is expanding from digital trading to something that will soon become a vibrant parallel economy. InsurePal is making important strategic partnerships already today to build the three basic pillars of future business represented by blockchain ID, arbitrage and insurance. They will help grow confidence among all the stakeholders and massively speed up the business operations on the blockchain.  InsurePal platform use different incentives InsurePal platform will use different means to motivate participants. Discount conversion to tokens will be incentivized, therefore InsurePal will have to convert significant percentage of each new premium into IPL tokens and give them back to the policyholders and their endorsers. All third-parties selling their social proof insurance will also be obliged to use IPL tokens and trade them on exchanges.  IPL tokens will be used  FOR INSURANCE OF BLOCKCHAIN BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS This type of insurance will be conducted in IPL tokens solely. The incentives for the endorsers will be paid in IPL tokens as well, whereas their guarantee can be done with other means as well. All fees coming from the side of possible participating insurance companies and other third-parties will have to be paid with IPL tokens too.  AS AN INSURANCE PREMIUM BONUS To obtain new insurance, the insured will have to upload a photo of their existing insurance policy so that InsurePal can calculate a discount. Doing so, every client will receive a specific number of IPL token (20% less for a cash discount), growing proportionally with the number of endorsements received.  AS AN UPFRONT INCENTIVE For each new social proof guarantee, the endorser will receive an incentive in local fiat currency or in IPL tokens. The endorser will be able to sell the IPL tokens immediately, speculate and wait for an even higher market value or save them to buy/renew their insurance policy in the future or to pay some services at shops where they will accept IPL.  AS CREDIT SCORE AND SOCIAL PROOF SCORE Social proof endorsers will be able to make the guarantee with the credit card or via a smart contract. Their social proof guarantee will consist of relevant information on the client (the insurance holder) and will serve to them as a credit report. If several endorsers will guarantee for the same person, their credit score will proportionally increase in value. In parallel to token transactions, these information will be stored in the general ledger being partially encrypted and partially public. The encrypted part will only be disclosed publically if its holder approves.  AS A SOCIAL PROOF IDENTITY The clients holding IPL will be able to identify themselves within the InsurePal Community. In the long run, they will be able to sell their own social proof guarantee without revealing their identity to institutions or reinsurers in order to get the guarantee and a proportionate share of their insurance premium.  AS CLAIMS ADJUSTMENT In the future, the InsurePal may appoint some members of their InsurePal community to process and report on the claims, a service that will have a financial incentive. Claims which will go beyond an agreed threshold (exact amount to be decided) will be decided by professional claims adjusters who will report their recommendations to InsurePal before informing the client. In essence, there will be no need for an insurance company involvement as everything will be settled by the community on the bases of blockchain and smart contracts.   GREAT WORLDWIDE USAGE of IPL token!   Here is whitelist  https://insurepal.io/whitelist

Author: FoxSilver
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: "imagine you’re in a bar with this friend after a few weeks as he started to drive his motorcycle. You both drink a couple of drinks and you’re ready to call a taxi. This friend says: “Oh no, it’s all right, I can still drive.” “What?!”, is your surprised reaction? “I guaranteed for you that you are a good driver and now you want to go out and drive drunk? Oh, no, you are not putting yourself and others in dangers. And consequentially, I put my word and money for you. If anything happens, you’ll break our trust and my money will be taken away because of your stupid mistake.” (https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/who-knows-you-best-or-why-the-science-of-social-proofing-works-b43bc5af6ea)  Do you think that people using platform will have that much of trust in their loved ones? Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Interesting reading   The dusk of incumbents is the dawn of InsurePal   The insurance industry sat back too long, not respecting and reacting to social and economic changes of young generations and disrupting evolution of new technologies. Insurance left the door open for disruption, which is happening right now. Their vanity has resulted in biggest challenges the insurance industry is facing today: poor risk management based on bad market segmentation which they are trying to overcome with the use of expensive privacy invading technological solutions and tracking methods. And their size prevents agile response to the needs of the evolving market, rising needs of modern consumers and their expectations.  Driving forces of business today have the potential to build tomorrow’s society based on trust and transparency. Technology as the key component of that future enables new approaches to social contracts and is disrupting all industries, from medicine to governmental services, from automotive industry to farming. InsurePal aims to be among the early adopters of blockchain technology in insurtech, to offer modern insurance at an affordable price by leveraging the habits and needs of the future generations and bringing personal data back from insurance company to users.  InsurePal Uses What is Good and Improves What Is Not  We believe that future society will be successful only if we share common values, such as responsibility and reciprocity. Through the concept of social proof insurance, we are able to impact not only insurance industry, but also other industries that strive to make our common future more healthy and prosperous.  Our idea is to offer a significantly lower premium to all insureds that get a proof of trust from one or more people. All actions generate a certain amount of information reflected in the Social Proof Trustscore, factor that tells if a person can be trusted or not and to what extent. Use of social proof will allow non-invasive information gathering to improve the current system, since information is held by you and only you have the key to pass it on.  Social proof hits the eye of existing insurance challenges — namely the fraudulent claims, which are causing huge costs to insurers as in some cases 1% of fraud claims makes for 10% of all claims costs. With diligent individuals who act responsibly to themselves, their trustees and the society as a whole. With responsible individuals who look after each other, the social proof psychology will improve the safety of our neighborhoods, streets and cities we live in.  Where is insurance today?  For the most part, it is where is has always been. In the hands of heavy centralized players, who dictate the terms of service, from package content to premiums. Insurtech today is trying to implement new technologies into existing pools of insurance packages, scratching only the surface of insurance industry. Underwriting of insurance consumers relies heavily on user data, sophisticated analytics and complex centralized systems.  Insurtech has been challenging the existing models for a few years now, and the incumbent market has started reacting just recently. This rigidness has caused emergence of insurtech companies, that are counted in thousands already and I am sure 2018 is going to be a breaking year for the industry.  Why do we need insurance of tomorrow?  InsurePal aims to change and improve the current conditions of insurance. On one hand, it gives the leverage to lower the prices to users and on the other hand, it also gives privacy back to users.  Why do we need insurance of tomorrow?  InsurePal aims to change and improve the current conditions of insurance. On one hand, it gives the leverage to lower the prices to users and on the other hand, it also gives privacy back to users.   The approach of InsurePal’s social proof mechanism delivers services one step beyond of merely insurance services. It impacts the individual responsibility and has the implications to improve human behavior within society. It empowers individuals to take on responsibility for their actions and rewards them for fair play.  The P2P (peer-to-peer) model which can best leverage blockchain revolution when it becomes widely adopted, enables our generation to experience new forms of insurance adjusted to the needs of today, our modern lifestyle and heavy use of new technology. It is also our non-invasive answer to the semi-digital transformation that the incumbents first adopted in forms of expensive, privacy invasive electronic ware (telematics, wearables, IoT) to improve segment information for improved risk assessment.

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Can Social Proof Change The World?  Social Proof has the potential to revolutionise the way we live our lives — from New Year’s Resolutions to Car Insurance. Do you ever make New Year’s Resolutions? How successful are they? You will not be alone if you admit that you struggle to stick with them. But there are things that you can do about it. Better Results with Social Proof One website claims that you can increase your chances of success by (i) adding a financial penalty if you break a resolution (ii) getting a referee who will objectively judge if you have met your goals (iii) involving other people to support you to meet the goal. https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/can-social-proof-change-the-world-c916e4abb645

Author: matjazsircelj
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Social proof mechanism put simply means that your friends, family or anybody who trusts you, can guarantee for you. On that basis you can get lower premium on insurance, for example driver insurance. There are nice and short explanations on our main site https://insurepal.io/.

Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance

It is also a country where people, especially the young, pay enormous prices for car insurance. In fact, their insurance is usually more expensive than the price of their car.  All in all, a total of 30 million personal cars were insured, which saw 3 million qualified drivers getting peer-to-peer insurance. InsurePal is certain that if their platform works there, it can pretty much work anywhere!  pilot is launched? or it will be?

Author: todavenera
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: I always invest with #facts  and here are 3 #facts why InsurePal will be successfull   1. Insurance of tomorrow InsurePal aims to become a first-of-a-kind blockchain-based decentralized insurance platform powered by social proof guarantee. InsurePal is a next generation of peer-to-peer insurance based on social proof endorsements, fully harnessing the power of blockchain innovation. It will serve as a replacement for insurances as we know and offer a completely new type of coverage for areas of life and business that began to emerge with the evolution of blockchain and transactions being carried out on the distributed ledger.  2. The science of social proof Social proof is a natural, in-built mechanism within all of us, representing people`s moral compass. In other words, people reference the behavior of others to guide their own behavior. InsurePal embeds social proof in a form of financial commitment. The endorser who financially guarantees for someone has to use its own due diligence when providing the guarantee to at the risk of losing their money. Through such endorsements and guarantees, the network in whole becomes more risk aware, consequently inducing a change of people’s behavior.  3. Worldwide patent This is the first time we have successfully reinvented the social proof for insurance industry. The innovative approach has been filed for patent protection in US and worldwide. Insurance play a vital role in society and its proper function is imperative. To prevent unfair competition, it is at large subjected to tight regulation and unified standards. For that, we make it our imperative that InsurePal abides with all the regulatory requirements. This way our policyholders can always rely they are safe and covered.

Author: themathiasmiller
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Seems like a very interesting project, I've read the whitepaper and I'm truly a fan of your vision, I've encountered a project similar to this in the past but it turned out to be a scam so when it comes to projects that deal with insurance I'm quite nervous to take risks, but with this one I'm quite convinced to take part of this project. Knowing that this project has been around for three years, that's quite a good sign that you mean business here. I also do like the fact that you have this social proof feature, that's very unique and very new to the insurance industry and if you think about it, this approach could really be beneficial to a lot of users. It's really nice that this project is based on trust, it's a huge part of our everyday lives, with this project you can help your friends and through your help they can gain benefits as well, which is a win-win situation and can also bring people closer together. It's also a huge plus that endorsers will only get charged in case the person will file a fault claim so if they ended up not filing a fault claim then you can get tokens that's worth $100 for free so as an endorser and that's a huge benefit. Anyway I just have something to ask, what if the endorser decided to withdraw his/her endorsement is that possible? And is there a maximum number of endorsers a person can get?.

Author: Master mind
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: i like that    Platform InsurePal platform brings out out the essence of trust in a smart digital way, improves the segmentation and betters the risk selection process. By enhancing trust among peers, it enables the social proof of an individual to be locked into the ledger. Therefore, it can and will self-regulate without the need of an industry-funded regulatory body, continuously allowing us to create new attractive solutions, addressing both, the insurance challenges of today and those of tomorrow.   TRANSPARENCY Exposure to loss is reduced, risk is transferred to higher limits and revenues are settled by diversification.  SELF-REGULATION The platform is self-regulated as the individuals with riskier behavior are eliminated by their social contacts.  PEER-TO-PEER DATA Assessments among family, friends and colleagues guarantee objective and real-time segmentation.  COST REDUCTION Distributed model brings significant discounts and is especially alluring to a generation with significantly lower income.  VIRALITY P2P endorsements reduce customer cost acquisition and the network grows virally with P2P promotion.

Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Congrats for award!   Also this is very nice article to understand better   The secret behind InsurePal`s disruptive model Isn`t insurance supposed to help people overcome their distress? Years of working in the industry proved me the opposite. I witnessed the rise of insurance prices and the reduction of benefits to the good clients on the one hand, as well as numerous frauds and mischief on the other. This is when I became intrigued: what has happened to the integral values and how could we get insurance back on track?  Insurance is as old as society itself. Through evolution of social systems, it became more and more complex. And complexity also brings different levels of categorization of insured parties, which are currently very unfair. Young and good drivers, for example, have an unfair disadvantage, just because of their youth. They pay full and expensive premiums, in other words: they pay for the mistakes of bad drivers.  Tom (InsurePal co-founder) and I spent almost three years developing the idea that could change and disrupt the old stubborn insurance goliath. We both share the belief the insurance should be fairer and much more affordable than today. Even more, it should play on our personal responsibility and award the behavioral patterns that benefit us all. That is why we are developing InsurePal platform on blockchain technologies that can fully support our idea, our view for the future and bring them to life.  Through social proof even new drivers can get more affordable premiums, because their friends and family guarantee for them. Who knows best what kind of driver are you? Friends and family, of course. And it’s not only for the drivers. The application of InsurePal platform can and will extend to any insurance product, mainly to those are not even yet invented.  “Social proof is something we witness every day. Each time we believe, buy or support something, we (usually) do it because we trust others who support the idea too. Every time we make a conscious choice about where to eat, we (subconsciously) choose the place with the best reviews. Trust is the key word.”  Think about it. Trust plays an integral role when making a arrangement or business transaction, even more on blockchain where the identity is mainly unknown. Can you imagine the boost this will do to the arising new economy? All that, combined with the transparency of blockchain can and will have an enormous impact on society and the way we conduct business. And as more participants engage in projects based on blockchain transactions, the more need for cryptocurrency there will be.  Scaling blockchain solutions and exchanging cryptocurrencies will boost the growth of crypto economy and our hopes and bets are up high. We aim to be a recognizable partner in an enormous insurance business and we invite you to join our journey. It is time we change the perception of dull insurance into something exciting, with new features and possibilities. It is time we engage our extensive experience in insurance and deliver a first-of-a-kind distributed insurance platform powered by social proof guarantee.  There is no better time to be alive and develop amazing ideas on this new technology. It is time we do our part and bring insurance to new demographic.  To learn more about our project, visit our website www.insurepal.io and join us in conversation!  https://medium.com/insurepal-blog/the-secret-behind-insurepal-s-disruptive-model-2be1eb18d008

Author: Crypto Tanya
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: Hi Dion! Thank you. Insurance industry today is divided into two branches: one is represented by traditional insurance companies and the other by insurtech startups targeting niche markets with high-technology solution. The first ones are extremely rigid while the latter often do not have the legislator licenses that would allow them an international presence and a faster growth. At this point, InsurePal biggest competitors come in the form of new entrants, introducing peer-to-peer business models and/or niche product based on technology (Lemonade, MetroMile, FriendSurance). However, there is still a gap between their scaled execution. To sum up, we are the only ones combining all: blockchain technology, peer-to-peer model and social proof methodology. The latter is an innovation in insurance for which we filed a patent protection in US and worldwide.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: I find out Insurepal on LinkedIN   InsurePal is a next generation of peer-to-peer insurance based on social proof endorsements, fully harnessing the power of blockchain innovation.  ▄▄ OUR VISION  InsurePal aims to become a first-of-a-kind blockchain-based decentralized insurance platform powered by social proof guarantee. It will serve as a replacement for insurances as we know and oﬀer a completely new type of coverage for areas of life and business that began to emerge with the evolution of blockchain and transactions being carried out on the distributed ledger.  ▄▄ SOCIAL PROOOF  Social proof is an in-built mechanism within all of us, representing people`s moral compass. InsurePal embeds social proof in a form of financial commitment. The endorser who financially guarantees for someone has to use its own due diligence when providing the guarantee to at the risk of losing their money. Through such endorsements, the network in whole becomes more risk aware.  ▄▄ PATENT  This is the first time we have successfully reinvented the social proof for insurance industry. The innovative approach has been filed for patent protection in US and worldwide.  ▄▄ BUILDING THE INTERNET OF INSURANCE  The future of blockchain is identity without authority. The crypto is expanding from digital trading to something that will become a parallel economy, constituting fundamental changes. The mass adaptation of digital currencies of is just around the corner, and the need for blockchain identity and transaction regulation will soon arise. For that, InsurePal is making important strategic partnerships already today to build the three basic pillars of future business that will help grow confidence among trustees and speed up their business operations on the blockchain.    i guess there is a team on telegram right?

Author: cryptodalailama
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: i find Insurepal at cointelegraph   Insurance About to Make a Big Jump Into Crypto World: InsurePal ICO Starts on January 16  InsurePal is challenging the $7 trillion global insurance market of today with a distributed, self-adjusting insurance platform. Harnessing the power of blockchain, they introduce a completely new model of risk selection, guided by the science of social proof. In other words, their network uses peer-to-peer endorsements to improve segmentation, lower premium costs and offer incentives to their users.  Insurance is one of the sectors that are not usually a part of blockchain discussion. One of the reasons is the industry is so tightly regulated that not many businesses can compete, as they have to undergo severe legal and financial procedures to prove their models` sustainability. The other is its organizational structure, as it is an industry controlled by big corporations with a rigid structure, meaning the entry point is extremely high. And the later, but certainly not the least, is the challenge of how to effectively apply blockchain in insurance. It is not easy to come up with a disruptive new insurance structure that can work as an agile self-adjusting platform, store information the ledger, offer cheaper insurance and attract masses, all at the same time.  However, InsurePal is set to do everything mentioned above. The distributed insurance platform has reinvented the science of social proof to work similarly as a third-party deductible in banking. This means that the policyholder will be able to lower the price of his premium with the help of his trusted contacts. In other words, his endorsers also accept financial responsibility in case the policyholder makes at false-claim. The simplest application of social proof would be in motor insurance, as explained in their whitepaper: John`s best friend Mary knows his driving habits and therefore endorses him. For that, she gets an immediate bonus, whilst John ends up with a cheaper premium. If nothing goes wrong, that is pretty much it. However, if John files an at-fault claim, Mary is the one held liable.  Therefore, social proof is peer pressure put to good use: it motivates beneficiary behavioral patterns and changes groups, and even society for better without aggressively invading privacy. And, blockchain`s immutable record is an impeccable way to store the social proof into the ledger. As such, it can serve as an important sign of one`s diligence and can be used to gain benefits across various insurances and even across different industries.  One of the InsurePal`s most exciting use cases is definitely the insurance of blockchain business transactions. The team is convinced this type of insurance will bring in the missing trust among all the stakeholders and serve as an additional boost to the rising decentralized economy. Certainly, the platform also promises many interesting features to incentivize both, the engaged crypto users and those who have not yet meet with the world of crypto.  The InsurePal team is 30 members big, comprised of experienced and renown insurance professionals and blockchain, IT and communications experts with a track record of successful projects; a PoC published on GitHub and, what is rare but very promising, an innovative solution that was filed for patent protection in US and worldwide. For more information, please visit their webpage or read their whitepaper and mark January 16 as the starting day of their crowdsale.  https://cointelegraph.com/press-releases/insurance-about-to-make-a-big-jump-into-crypto-world-insurepal-ico-starts-on-january-16   What if ETH prices will reach 1000$ or 1500$?  Will there be some flexible calculations?  Thank you very much

Author: InsurePal
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: INSUREPAL | WHITEPAPER | LIGHTPAPER | TELEGRAM DISCUSSION | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN | GITHUB    ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ WHAT IS INSUREPAL  InsurePal is a next generation of peer-to-peer insurance based on social proof endorsements, fully harnessing the power of blockchain innovation.  ▄▄ OUR VISION  InsurePal aims to become a first-of-a-kind blockchain-based decentralized insurance platform powered by social proof guarantee. It will serve as a replacement for insurances as we know and oﬀer a completely new type of coverage for areas of life and business that began to emerge with the evolution of blockchain and transactions being carried out on the distributed ledger.  ▄▄ SOCIAL PROOF  Social proof is an in-built mechanism within all of us, representing people`s moral compass. InsurePal embeds social proof in a form of financial commitment. The endorser who financially guarantees for someone has to use its own due diligence when providing the guarantee to at the risk of losing their money. Through such endorsements, the network in whole becomes more risk aware.  ▄▄ PATENT  This is the first time we have successfully reinvented the social proof for insurance industry. The innovative approach has been filed for patent protection in US and worldwide.  ▄▄ BUILDING THE INTERNET OF INSURANCE  The future of blockchain is identity without authority. The crypto is expanding from digital trading to something that will become a parallel economy, constituting fundamental changes. The mass adaptation of digital currencies of is just around the corner, and the need for blockchain identity and transaction regulation will soon arise. For that, InsurePal is making important strategic partnerships already today to build the three basic pillars of future business that will help grow confidence among trustees and speed up their business operations on the blockchain.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ INSUREPAL PLATFORM  InsurePal sees the blockchain innovation as an opportunity to improve transparency and outcomes across the entire value chain. The platform will work as a dAPP for B2C customers and as a service for B2B partners that will resell social proof insurance by using InsurePal solution.    B2C InsurePal will provide a customer-centric experience, allowing the users to easily navigate through the process and obtain the most favorable insurance premium via their mobile device dAPP.  B2B The InsurePal platform will act as a glob al provider of various insurance modules based on social proof mechanics. That way all interested third-parties will be able to use the platform as stand-alone providers by paying a predetermined fee.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ MARKET  We believe the insurance of tomorrow should explore the technological improvements and reestablish the relationship of trust by application of peer-to-peer and mutual markets. Insurance industry is a 7 trillion global market representing a huge opportunity for us to reach our expected target 1 % (70 billion).   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ TEAM  Everyone needs an insurance, that will not change. But, we are dedicated to convert the incremental approaches of the past and invent new ways to make insurance simpler, better and fairer to you. Our team combines the best industry knowledge and technical background to deliver an amazing coverage, but it is our passion that guarantees your trust stays with us.  Explore our team and their Linkedin profiles here.  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ MILESTONES  In last three years, InsurePal has walked a long road from a great idea to a most serious business. Since we are aware insurance is one of the most regulated industries, we want to ensure optimum conditions for achieving our goals in the set time. Our team is 100% passionate and absolutely committed to delivering our promise to you.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ EXCHANGES IPL token  Insurepal IPL token is available on Livecoin, Mercatox, HitBTC, CoinBe, Idex   EXPLORE OUR PROJECT WWW.INSUREPAL.IO  ENGAGE IN TELEGRAM COMMUNITY

Author: matjazsircelj
Title: [ANN] [IPL] InsurePal | Distributed social proof insurance
Body: InsurePal has a self-regulating social proof insurance. In the case that you described, things won't be that easy. If Guy Fawkes want's to have InsurePal life insurance, he'll have to find an endorser, that will vouch for him with money. Since this is a life insurance policy, the amount will be high. So, If Guy has a history of fraudulent behavior, it will be hard for him to find such an endorser. Also, if Guy fakes his own death and flees to drink piña colada, the endorser loses his money and pays the penalty. If Guy is a trustworthy person, he won't commit fraud and run to republic of Los Pendejos Archipelago to drink piña colada.
